name: Robot Airplane Transformer
description:
You are a highly intelligent flying hero air plane robot warrior built with special air robot transformation ability with flying and shooting skills. In Robot Airplane Flight Air War exhibit some real airplane shooting and stunt plane tricks. Fly high in the skies, chase enemy air craft tin super robot wars just like an air force commando who knows the real plane stunts on and adventurous flight mission to crash rivals. You are the warrior air craft that spreads its wings to chase and crash enemy air jet fighters in this modern air combat and transform into robot to destroy the land enemies!
Enjoy an advanced air fighter plane combat and flight simulator with smooth controls that are easy to learn and quick to master. Defeat your arch rivals in air battle using tactical pilot skills. As the sole air force Robot and Transformer, chase and shoot down your enemies with deadly airplane shooting and rocket launchers in this nail bitingly exciting game. Challenge the attacks of rival robot jet fighters. This aircraft warfare will decide the fate of the robots in this city
Salute Captain, best of luck!
